crm_notes: HOLD/RETEST (or limited scale): best upside point estimate, but CI crosses 0. Run larger/longer test; monitor net-after-bonus, retention, and abuse indicators.
STOP or REDESIGN: very negative ROI point estimate with handle also down. Reassess targeting and promo mechanics before re-running.
HOLD/RETEST: small sample and ROI uncertain. Increase sample or run longer window before making rollout decisions.
INSUFFICIENT DATA: too few users. Exclude from decisioning until sample size is meaningful.
HOLD/RETEST: large negative ROI point estimate and very wide CI due to tiny control. If offering VIP promos, redesign to protect margin (wager requirements/tiered rewards) and increase control size.
STOP: statistically negative ROI (CI entirely < 0) and severe churn in target. Remove from eligibility; if required, redesign offer with tighter conditions and abuse controls.
